name: Cogitron
description: Cogitron is a robotics project focused on developing advanced AI‑driven robots capable of performing complex tasks autonomously by integrating machine learning, computer vision and robust mechatronics.

name: TutorAI
description: TutorAI is an educational platform that leverages large language models to deliver adaptive, personalized learning paths, dynamic feedback and study analytics to students.

name: Deeptactics
description: Deeptactics explores deep reinforcement learning and game theory to build agents that plan, adapt and strategize optimally in complex multi‑step decision environments.

name: Styret
description: Styret is the board of Cogito, overseeing strategic direction, governance, finance and cross‑project alignment to ensure sustainable impact.

name: Web Platform
description: Full‑stack internal platform providing member portal, event management, content publishing, authentication and role‑based access.

name: EdgeVision
description: Low‑power embedded vision hardware and firmware enabling on‑device object detection, tracking and sensor fusion at the edge.

name: VisionDetect
description: Cross‑platform computer vision library and benchmarking suite for training, evaluating and optimizing detection models.

name: DataLake
description: Centralized data infrastructure handling ingestion, ETL, quality checks and analytics datasets for all active projects.

name: InfraOps
description: Shared infrastructure, IaC modules, observability stack and CI/CD pipelines standardizing deployment across projects.

name: Outreach
description: Partnerships, events and public engagement initiatives expanding Cogito's network, recruitment and visibility.

name: LegacyBot
description: Early differential‑drive exploration robot used to prototype navigation, SLAM and embedded control frameworks.

name: Portal v1
description: First generation member portal focusing on authentication, announcements feed and basic project directory.

name: Economy Tools
description: Automation suite for budgeting, reimbursements, expense tracking, ledger exports and financial reporting.

name: DataPipeline v1
description: First generation ETL pipeline consolidating sensor logs, experiment metrics and annotated datasets.

name: EarlyCV
description: Prototype computer vision stack for foundational experiments in line following, color segmentation and basic detection.

name: Foundations
description: Initial organizational setup project establishing documentation, coding standards, onboarding and knowledge base.
